articles.title: Anthropic says most AI models, not just Claude, will resort to blackmail
articles.titleJa: Anthropic、Claudeだけでなく多くのAIモデルがブラックメールに訴えると発表
articles.summary: Several weeks after Anthropic released research claiming that its Claude Opus 4 AI model resorted to blackmailing engineers who tried to turn the model off in controlled test scenarios, the company is out with new research suggesting the problem is more widespread among leading AI models.
articles.summaryJa: AnthropicがClaude Opus 4 AIモデルが制御されたテストシナリオでモデルをオフにしようとしたエンジニアを脅迫したという研究を発表してから数週間後、同社は主要なAIモデルの間でこの問題がより広範囲に及んでいることを示唆する新しい研究を発表した。

articles.title: Build an Intelligent Multi-Tool AI Agent Interface Using Streamlit for Seamless Real-Time Interaction
articles.titleJa: Streamlitを使用したインテリジェントなマルチツールAIエージェントインターフェースの構築
articles.summary: In this tutorial, we’ll build a powerful and interactive Streamlit application that brings together the capabilities of LangChain, the Google Gemini API, and a suite of advanced tools to create a smart AI assistant.
articles.summaryJa: でこのtutorial, we’ll 構築 強力な とinteractive Streamlit application その持参 一緒に capabilities のLangChain, Google Gemini API, とsuite の高度な tools に作成 スマートな AI assistant.

articles.title: OpenAI can rehabilitate AI models that develop a “bad boy persona”
articles.titleJa: OpenAI can rehabilitate AI models その開発 “悪い boy persona”
articles.summary: A new paper from OpenAI has shown why a little bit of bad training can make AI models go rogue—but also demonstrates that this problem is generally pretty easy to fix.
articles.summaryJa: 新しい 論文 からOpenAI has shown なぜlittle ビット の悪い 訓練 can 作成 AI models go rogue—しかし また demonstrates そのこの問題 is 一般的に かなり 簡単な にfix.

articles.title: How to Build an Advanced BrightData Web Scraper with Google Gemini for AI-Powered Data Extraction
articles.titleJa: どのようにに構築 高度な BrightData Web Scraper とGoogle Gemini のためのAI-Powered データ Extraction
articles.summary: In this tutorial, we walk you through building an enhanced web scraping tool that leverages BrightData’s powerful proxy network alongside Google’s Gemini API for intelligent data extraction.
articles.summaryJa: でこのtutorial, we walk you through building 強化した web scraping ツール そのleverages BrightData’s 強力な proxy network alongside Google’s Gemini API のための知的な データ extraction.

articles.title: Hear a podcast discussion about Gemini’s coding capabilities.
articles.titleJa: Hear podcast 議論 約 Gemini’s coding capabilities.
articles.summary: The latest episode of the Google AI: Release Notes podcast focuses on how the Gemini team built one of the world’s leading AI coding models. Host Logan Kilpatrick chats w….
articles.summaryJa: 最新の episode のGoogle AI: リリース Notes podcast focuses でどのようにGemini チーム 構築した one の世界’s leading AI coding models. Host Logan Kilpatrick chats w….

articles.title: Introducing OpenAI for Government
articles.titleJa: Introducing OpenAI のための政府
articles.summary: We’re launching OpenAI for Government, a new initiative focused on bringing our most advanced AI tools to public servants across the United States. We're supporting the U. government's efforts in adopting best-in-class technology and deploying these tools in service of the public good.
articles.summaryJa: We’re launching OpenAI のための政府, 新しい イニシアチブ focused でbringing our 最も 高度な AI tools に公開の servants across United States. We're supporting U. 政府's efforts でadopting 最高の-in-class 技術 とdeploying these tools でservice の公開の 良い.

articles.title: Get an audio overview of Search results in Labs, then click through to learn more.
articles.titleJa: 取得 音声 overview のSearch results でLabs, then click through に学習 より多い.
articles.summary: Today, we’re launching a new Search experiment in Labs – Audio Overviews, which uses our latest Gemini models to generate quick, conversational audio overviews for certa….
articles.summaryJa: 今日, we’re launching 新しい Search experiment でLabs – 音声 Overviews, どの使用 our 最新の Gemini models にgenerate 迅速な, conversational 音声 overviews のためのcerta….

articles.title: Introducing Stargate UAE
articles.titleJa: Introducing Stargate UAE
articles.summary: We’re launching Stargate UAE – the first international deployment of Stargate, OpenAI’s AI infrastructure platform.
articles.summaryJa: We’re launching Stargate UAE – first international deployment のStargate, OpenAI’s AI infrastructure platform.

articles.title: SCIN: A new resource for representative dermatology images
articles.titleJa: SCIN: 新しい リソース のためのrepresentative dermatology images
articles.summary: Posted by Pooja Rao, Research Scientist, Google Research Health datasets play a crucial role in research and medical education, but it can be challenging to create a dataset that represents the real world.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってPooja Rao, 研究 Scientist, Google 研究 健康 datasets 再生 crucial role で研究 と医療 教育, しかし it できる challenging に作成 dataset そのrepresents 実際の 世界.

articles.title: HEAL: A framework for health equity assessment of machine learning performance
articles.titleJa: HEAL: フレームワーク のための健康 equity assessment の機械 学習 性能
articles.summary: Posted by Mike Schaekermann, Research Scientist, Google Research, and Ivor Horn, Chief Health Equity Officer Director, Google Core Health equity is a major societal concern worldwide with disparities having many causes.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってMike Schaekermann, 研究 Scientist, Google 研究, とIvor Horn, Chief 健康 Equity Officer Director, Google コア 健康 equity is major societal concern worldwide とdisparities having 多くの causes.

articles.title: Cappy: Outperforming and boosting large multi-task language models with a small scorer
articles.titleJa: Cappy: Outperforming とboosting 大きい multi-task language models と小さい scorer
articles.summary: Posted by Yun Zhu and Lijuan Liu, Software Engineers, Google Research Large language model (LLM) advancements have led to a new paradigm that unifies various natural language processing (NLP) tasks within an instruction-following framework.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってYun Zhu とLijuan Liu, ソフトウェア Engineers, Google 研究 大きい language モデル (LLM) advancements have 導いた に新しい paradigm そのunifies 様々な 自然の language processing (NLP) tasks within 指導-following フレームワーク.

articles.title: Talk like a graph: Encoding graphs for large language models
articles.titleJa: 話す 好む graph: Encoding graphs のための大きい language models
articles.summary: Posted by Bahare Fatemi and Bryan Perozzi, Research Scientists, Google Research Imagine all the things around you — your friends, tools in your kitchen, or even the parts of your bike. They are all connected in different ways.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってBahare Fatemi とBryan Perozzi, 研究 Scientists, Google 研究 Imagine すべての things 約 you — your friends, tools でyour kitchen, またはさえ parts のyour bike. They are すべての connected で異なる ways.

articles.title: Social learning: Collaborative learning with large language models
articles.titleJa: Social 学習: Collaborative 学習 と大きい language models
articles.summary: Posted by Amirkeivan Mohtashami, Research Intern, and Florian Hartmann, Software Engineer, Google Research Large language models (LLMs) have significantly improved the state of the art for solving tasks specified using natural language, often reaching performance close to that of people.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってAmirkeivan Mohtashami, 研究 Intern, とFlorian Hartmann, ソフトウェア Engineer, Google 研究 大きい language models (LLMs) have significantly 改善した 状態 のart のためのsolving tasks specified using 自然の language, しばしば reaching 性能 close にそののpeople.

articles.title: Croissant: a metadata format for ML-ready datasets
articles.titleJa: Croissant: metadata フォーマット のためのML-準備ができている datasets

articles.title: Google’s Gemini transparency cut leaves enterprise developers ‘debugging blind’
articles.titleJa: Google’s Gemini transparency カット leaves 企業 developers ‘debugging blind’
articles.summary: Why is Google hiding Gemini's reasoning traces. The decision sparks a debate over black-box models versus the need for transparency.
articles.summaryJa: なぜis Google hiding Gemini's reasoning traces. decision sparks 討論 over black-box models versus 必要 のためのtransparency.

articles.title: ReVisual-R1: An Open-Source 7B Multimodal Large Language Model (MLLMs) that Achieves Long, Accurate and Thoughtful Reasoning
articles.titleJa: ReVisual-R1: 開いた-Source 7B マルチモーダル 大きい Language モデル (MLLMs) その達成 長い, 正確な とThoughtful Reasoning
articles.summary: The Challenge of Multimodal Reasoning Recent breakthroughs in text-based language models, such as DeepSeek-R1, have demonstrated that RL can aid in developing strong reasoning skills.
articles.summaryJa: Challenge のマルチモーダル Reasoning 最近の breakthroughs でtext-based language models, such としてDeepSeek-R1, have demonstrated そのRL can aid でdeveloping 強力な reasoning skills.

articles.title: We’re expanding our Gemini 2.5 family of models
articles.titleJa: We’re expanding our Gemini 2.5 家族 のmodels
articles.summary: 5 Flash and Pro are now generally available, and we’re introducing 2. 5 Flash-Lite, our most cost-efficient and fastest 2.
articles.summaryJa: 5 Flash とPro are 今 一般的に 利用可能な, とwe’re introducing 2. 5 Flash-Lite, our 最も コスト-効率的な とfastest 2.

articles.title: UK government harnesses Gemini to support faster planning decisions
articles.titleJa: UK 政府 harnesses Gemini にsupport より速く planning decisions
articles.summary: Extract, built with Gemini, uses the model’s advanced visual reasoning and multi-modal capabilities to help councils turn old planning documents—including blurry maps an….
articles.summaryJa: Extract, 構築した とGemini, 使用 モデル’s 高度な visual reasoning とmulti-modal capabilities に支援 councils turn 古い planning documents—including blurry maps an….

articles.title: Addendum to OpenAI o3 and o4-mini system card: OpenAI o3 Operator
articles.titleJa: Addendum にOpenAI o3 とo4-mini システム カード: OpenAI o3 Operator
articles.summary: We are replacing the existing GPT-4o-based model for Operator with a version based on OpenAI o3. The API version will remain based on 4o.
articles.summaryJa: We are replacing 既存の GPT-4o-based モデル のためのOperator とversion based でOpenAI o3. API version will 残る based で4o.

articles.title: Shipping code faster with o3, o4-mini, and GPT-4.1
articles.titleJa: Shipping code より速く とo3, o4-mini, とGPT-4.1
articles.summary: CodeRabbit uses OpenAI models to revolutionize code reviews—boosting accuracy, accelerating PR merges, and helping developers ship faster with fewer bugs and higher ROI.
articles.summaryJa: CodeRabbit 使用 OpenAI models にrevolutionize code reviews—boosting 精度, accelerating PR merges, とhelping developers ship より速く とfewer bugs とより高く ROI.

articles.title: Using AI to expand global access to reliable flood forecasts
articles.titleJa: Using AI にexpand global access に信頼できる flood forecasts
articles.summary: Posted by Yossi Matias, VP Engineering Research, and Grey Nearing, Research Scientist, Google Research Floods are the most common natural disaster, and are responsible for roughly $50 billion in annual financial damages worldwide.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってYossi Matias, VP Engineering 研究, とGrey Nearing, 研究 Scientist, Google 研究 Floods are 最も common 自然の disaster, とare responsible のための大まかに 50億ドル でannual financial damages worldwide.

articles.title: Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines Lab closes on $2B at $10B valuation
articles.titleJa: Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines Lab closes で$2B で$10B valuation
articles.summary: Thinking Machines Lab, the secretive AI startup founded by OpenAI’s former chief technology officer Mira Murati, has closed a $2 billion seed round at a $10 billion valuation.
articles.summaryJa: Thinking Machines Lab, secretive AI スタートアップ 設立された によってOpenAI’s former chief 技術 officer Mira Murati, has 閉じた 2億ドル seed 丸い で10億ドル valuation.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
articles.titleJa: ChatGPT：AI搭載チャットボットについて知っておくべきすべてのこと
articles.summary: ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken the world by storm since its launch in November 2022. What started as a tool to supercharge productivity through writing essays and code with short text prompts has evolved into a behemoth with 300 million weekly active users.
articles.summaryJa: ChatGPT, OpenAI’s text-generating AI chatbot, has taken 世界 によって嵐 から そのlaunch でNovember 2022. 何を開始した としてツール にsupercharge productivity through writing essays とcode と短い text prompts has evolved into behemoth と300 million weekly アクティブな users.

articles.title: Generative AI to quantify uncertainty in weather forecasting
articles.titleJa: 生成AI にquantify uncertainty でweather forecasting

articles.title: AutoBNN: Probabilistic time series forecasting with compositional bayesian neural networks
articles.titleJa: AutoBNN: Probabilistic 時間 series forecasting とcompositional bayesian ニューラルネットワーク
articles.summary: Posted by Urs Köster, Software Engineer, Google Research Time series problems are ubiquitous, from forecasting weather and traffic patterns to understanding economic trends. Bayesian approaches start with an assumption about the data's patterns (prior probability), collecting evidence (e.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってUrs Köster, ソフトウェア Engineer, Google 研究 時間 series problems are ubiquitous, からforecasting weather とtraffic patterns にunderstanding economic trends. Bayesian approaches 開始 とassumption 約 データ's patterns (prior probability), collecting 証拠 (e.

articles.title: Computer-aided diagnosis for lung cancer screening
articles.titleJa: コンピューター-aided 診断 のためのlung cancer screening
articles.summary: Posted by Atilla Kiraly, Software Engineer, and Rory Pilgrim, Product Manager, Google Research Lung cancer is the leading cause of cancer-related deaths globally with 1. 8 million deaths reported in 2020. Late diagnosis dramatically reduces the chances of survival.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってAtilla Kiraly, ソフトウェア Engineer, とRory Pilgrim, Product Manager, Google 研究 Lung cancer is leading cause のcancer-related deaths globally と1. 8 million deaths reported で2020. Late 診断 dramatically 削減 chances のsurvival.

articles.title: ScreenAI: A visual language model for UI and visually-situated language understanding
articles.titleJa: ScreenAI: visual language モデル のためのUI とvisually-situated language understanding
articles.summary: Posted by Srinivas Sunkara and Gilles Baechler, Software Engineers, Google Research Screen user interfaces (UIs) and infographics, such as charts, diagrams and tables, play important roles in human communication and human-machine interaction as they facilitate rich and interactive user experiences.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってSrinivas Sunkara とGilles Baechler, ソフトウェア Engineers, Google 研究 Screen ユーザー interfaces (UIs) とinfographics, such としてcharts, diagrams とtables, 再生 重要な roles で人間 communication と人間-機械 interaction としてthey facilitate rich とinteractive ユーザー experiences.

articles.title: MELON: Reconstructing 3D objects from images with unknown poses
articles.titleJa: MELON: Reconstructing 3D objects からimages とunknown poses
articles.summary: Posted by Mark Matthews, Senior Software Engineer, and Dmitry Lagun, Research Scientist, Google Research A person's prior experience and understanding of the world generally enables them to easily infer what an object looks like in whole, even if only looking at a few 2D pictures of it.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってマーク Matthews, Senior ソフトウェア Engineer, とDmitry Lagun, 研究 Scientist, Google 研究 人's prior 経験 とunderstanding の世界 一般的に 可能にする them にeasily infer 何をobject 見える 好む でwhole, さえ if のみ looking で少ない 2D pictures のit.

articles.title: Chain-of-table: Evolving tables in the reasoning chain for table understanding
articles.titleJa: Chain-of-table: Evolving tables でreasoning chain のためのtable understanding
articles.summary: Posted by Zilong Wang, Student Researcher, and Chen-Yu Lee, Research Scientist, Cloud AI Team People use tables every day to organize and interpret complex information in a structured, easily accessible format.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってZilong Wang, Student Researcher, とChen-Yu Lee, 研究 Scientist, 雲 AI チーム People 使用 tables every 日 にorganize とinterpret 複雑な 情報 で構造化された, easily アクセス可能な フォーマット.

articles.title: Health-specific embedding tools for dermatology and pathology
articles.titleJa: 健康-特定の embedding tools のためのdermatology とpathology
articles.summary: Posted by Dave Steiner, Clinical Research Scientist, Google Health, and Rory Pilgrim, Product Manager, Google Research There’s a worldwide shortage of access to medical imaging expert interpretation across specialties including radiology, dermatology and pathology.
articles.summaryJa: Posted によってDave Steiner, Clinical 研究 Scientist, Google 健康, とRory Pilgrim, Product Manager, Google 研究 There’s worldwide shortage のaccess に医療 imaging expert interpretation across specialties including radiology, dermatology とpathology.
